work_experiences.name: Data Scientist - [Corti](https://www.corti.ai/)
work_experiences.description: AI driven emergency medical consulation analysis, disease detection and automated triage
skills: Wrote NLP search and ingestion API on top of Elasticsearch to enable conversation quality analysis.
Developed NLP pipelines for direct and implied medical questions and other conversational features.
Developed a framework for ingesting audio and metadata to integrate with call recorder systems.
Implemented text classification models for detecting medical features such as Cardiac Arrest.

work_experiences.name: Data Scientist - [Min Doktor Healthcare AB](https://www.mindoktor.se/)
work_experiences.description: Health-tech startup focusing on text and image-based digital primary care and automated triage.
skills: Designed and developed automated ETL pipelines, data warehousing and data visualization schemas.
Built statistical predictive models such as customer LTV and NLP models such as symptom classification
Developed and deployed internal web-applications for ML data quality testing and improvement work.
Built GDPR and HIPAA compliance into warehouse architecture for storing personal and sensitive data.

work_experiences.name: Modelling Consultant - [Ocean and Land Resource Assessment Consultants](https://www.olsps.com/)
work_experiences.description: Fisheries modelling consultancy working with South African Government to allocate allowable catch
skills: Rewrote optimization procedure for allowable catch model with a modern optimization package leading to 10x speed increases in optimization
